{"id":1047689074,"question_id":125,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"6 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1694540331,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"87 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1047689074/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"22.4 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def isPalindrome(self, s: str) -> bool:\n\n        def valid_char(c):\n            pred = ord(\"0\") <= ord(c) and ord(c) <= ord(\"9\")\n            pred2 = ord(\"A\") <= ord(c) and ord(c) <= ord(\"Z\")\n            pred3 = ord(\"a\") <= ord(c) and ord(c) <= ord(\"z\")\n            return pred or pred2 or pred3\n                \n\n        cs = []\n\n        for c in s:\n            if valid_char(c):\n                cs.append(c.lower())\n\n        cs = \"\".join(cs)\n        \n        j = len(cs) - 1\n        i = 0\n\n        while i < j:\n\n            if cs[i] != cs[j]:\n                return False\n\n            i +=1\n            j -=1\n\n        return True\n\n\n\n        ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
